attributes.action: Change the drink drive limit to 5/100
attributes.additional_details:
We, the undersigned, petition the Government to reduce the Drink & Drive limit to 5 milligrams of alcohol per 100 millilitres of blood.

Not only will this make our roads safer for the masses, it will save lives, enforce the Think! Campaign of not drink driving, and random on-the-spot checks will be more fruitful.

Many lives have been lost by drink-driving, the government is not doing enough to reduce this number, and whilst EU rules are 50/100ml for once GB should set a trend and reduce this limit more.

It is not penalising the sensible, it's coming down hard on the irresponsible.
